title: Unum karaindu
sahitya:
Unum karaindu nAnAgi nAnum karaindu nIyAgum uNmai shollAi cinmayanE tanmayanE enmayanE


anupallavi

  tEnum pAlum tIng-kanirasamum dEvar amudum sErndadu pOlE


caraNam    ceppaDi viddaiyAm muppaDiyellAm jIva sahapara cintanai ellAm
appaDi ippaDi eppaDi enbadellAm ippaDi enruLLE oppurak-kATTi 
uLLam uNarvAgi uNarvE uyirAgi uyirum nIyAgi nIyE nAnAgi
onrE onrAgi nanrE ninrADum padam pera nidamum arputam puri iraivanE
